name: Beyond Tradition
description:
What happens when Manami leaves the village to fulfill her destiny?

The Ishikawa family has lived peacefully in the mountainside away from civilization. But times weren't always this peaceful, and an unspoken curse hangs over their heads constantly. Manami Ishikawa, the eldest daughter, is finally leaving home to fulfill her role in feeding the dangerous Obake. But she alone harbors a secret... she doesn't believe the stories about him are true!

Play as Manami Ishikawa as she embarks on her destined route to meet the Obake. Influence her dialogue and see what will happen in our multiple endings.

FEATURES:
  • Two different endings depending on what you say!
  • A special route with an even special CG awaiting you
  • Beautiful painterly style backgrounds and expressive sprites!
  • Decide... will you accept the stories or toss them aside?
  • Customization provided in the settings!
  • A short, sweet story to enjoy in one sitting
  • 10k+ words and more!
  • Relaxing music to listen to while playing
CREDITS:
  • Oishii - Director,  Lead Writer
  • Zel - Programmer
  • Ruvik - Sprite, CG and Background Artist
  • Sayumi101 - UI Artist
  • Yuri - Editor, Support Writer
